Class GameState

java.lang.Object
fr.uge.backpackhero.logic.GameState
public class GameState extends Object
GameState manages the overall state of the game, including the dungeon, hero, backpack, current position, and combat status. It provides methods to access and modify these components as the game progresses.
Author:
Yacine

    Creates a new GameState with default initial values.

    • exitFloor

      public void exitFloor()
      Advances the game to the next floor and resets the hero's position. For simplicity, the hero's position is reset to (0,0) on the new floor but we will maybe modify that later when the map generation algorithm will be implemented.

    • getBackpack

      public Backpack getBackpack()

      Returns:
      the combat engine

    • isInCombat

      public boolean isInCombat()
      Checks if the game is currently in combat.
      Returns:
      true if the game is in combat, false otherwise
